title.en: The Strongest Earthbound Spirit and the Guy With No Spiritual Sense

altTitles.en: The Strongest Haunted House and the Guy With No Spiritual Sense
The Story Of The Strongest Stigmatized Property & The Guy With Zero Spiritual Sense.

altTitles.ru: Рассказ о переполненном призраками доме и мужчине с нулевым экстрасенсорным восприятием

altTitles.zh: 最强事故物件与灵感应能力为零的男子

altTitles.zh-hk: 最強事故物件與靈感應能力爲零的男子

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Jibakurei to Reikan Zero Otoko no Hanashi.

altTitles.en: The Story Of The Strongest Earthbound Spirit & The Guy With Zero Spiritual Sense.

altTitles.ja-ro: Saikyou Jibakurei to Reikan Zero Otoko

altTitles.en: The Strongest Earthbound Spirit & The Guy With Zero Spiritual Sense
Super Ghost Girl & Non Sixth Sense Guy

altTitles.vi: Ngôi nhà bị ma ám mạnh nhất và chàng trai không có linh cảm

altTitles.id: Rumah Hantu Terkuat dan Cowok yang Nggak Peka sama Hal Gaib

altTitles.uk: Історія про Найсильнішого Злого Духа та Чоловіка із нульовим екстрасенсорним сприйняттям

description.en:
On the last day before a guy who can't sense any spirits at all moves out from his supposedly haunted house, Kinako-sama, the self-proclaimed strongest earth-bound spirit, will try her best to scare the living hell out of the guy before he leaves for good.
___
**KADOKAWA Version Links:**
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0BW9BSLZ7)
- [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/745607/)
description.vi: Trước khi main dọn nhà đi, Kinako-sama phải dọa cho hắn són đái ra quần mới được
